The HGttG on the front page isn't a Quest game, it's the classic one from the 80s that was written with Douglas Adams' input. (Well worth a play if you've never tried it.)

As for fan-based games in general, unless the site has a specific policy I would assume it would all fall into the same category as fanfiction or fanart. ie: everybody's been doing it for years and lawyers long ago stopped giving a crap as long as you're not making any money.
